data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What are some advantages and disadvantages to having a class based on discussion at school? What types of classes do you think benefit the most from having a discussion format? For instance, do you think math classes benefit from having a format where everyone participates and discusses?
data.answer: I think discussion can help people learn more by exchanging ideas and intuitions. However, some drawbacks may happen as the academic discussion can easily turn into a daily conversation. I think STEM courses including Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics can be benefited more from the class-based discussion. The reason is those courses are usually difficult and would need peer stimulation to trigger problem-solving skills. Different people may have different thoughts to figure out a hard question, and people can always learn from each other.
